title: FPS drop while moving mouse
body: So since the new update all my games startet to lag horribly and its almost impossible to play. If I dont move the mouse i get like 110fps and it stays on that amount.. as soon as I move the mouse a little bit fast it drops down to 10 even 7 fps.. i tried to put off the snow map didnt help, tried to repair the game didnt help, tried to uninstall and install again the game didnt help, i deleted the game.cfg and persistedsettings.json file and it didnt help, I updated my video card driver settings but still I get the fps drop..

replies.body:
I tried to delete game.cfg and persistedsettings.json but it didnt help..

Your mouse settings could be corrupt and causing problems trying to respond to your input.  See if a config reset might help:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

If the issue persists then we'll need to get some more info to see if this is an fps issue, or something like packet loss that has similar symptoms.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for the impacted games so we can know for sure!
theres been so many reports of this recently but it seems riot isn't even trying to help
the bug is still in the game i cant believe it..
Same issue here, low settings don't help, I reinstalled league and it was fixed for half a game then it started again.
Have you tried low spec mode, and checking to close the client while in game?
